body_html:
The nightly docker images are on Ubuntu 16.04, which should make the problem go away. For now, I'd recommend using the nightly.

The official builds will be on Ubuntu 16.04 when TensorFlow 1.1 is out.
body_text:
The nightly docker images are on Ubuntu 16.04, which should make the problem go away.  For now, I'd recommend using the nightly.
The official builds will be on Ubuntu 16.04 when TensorFlow 1.1 is out.
body:
The nightly docker images are on Ubuntu 16.04, which should make the problem go away.  For now, I'd recommend using the nightly.

The official builds will be on Ubuntu 16.04 when TensorFlow 1.1 is out.
